summary: CONSUMER MADE AN APPOINTMENT FOR RECALL ON DEFECTIVE IGNITION SWITCH AND DEALER HAS FAILED TO FIX IT. NAR 1-22-03  WHEN THE CONSUME ARRIVED TO HAVE THE RECALL REPAIR MADE, SHE WAS TOLD SHE WOULD HAVE TO DISCONNECT HER ALARM AT HER EXPENSE. THE CONSUMER INCURRED A COST OF $65.00. THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT FROM HONDA.  (LAWYER PAMELA BATES ON BEHALF OF CLIENT FRAN MORRALL)*JB
